PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15832010-12-09,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectStockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants **RATIFICATION**
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEXES A, B AND C TO THE STOCKHOLM CONVENTION ON PERSISTENT ORGANIC POLLUTANTS, 22 MAY 2001, done at Geneva on 8 May 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
